response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value to you, I understand its worth is estimated at $10,000. Considering both the quality and the unique features of this product, I am offering it to you for $9,500. This is a special opportunity to acquire an item that could significantly enhance your experience or project. Should you have any questions or need more information, please don't hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of serving you.", "product_price": 9500}
